IEEE Helwan Student Branch 
 www.ieeehsb.org SOON! 

 Helwan University School of Engineering has established the IEEE Student Branch in Faculty of Engineering in May, 2000 under Egypt Section. With the vision to "Empower, inspire, and enable each one become the future leader of his own profession". 

 Empower: 
 IEEE|HSB passionate volunteers started its very first development activities in 2010 with basic electronics workshop; first peer-to-peer workshop implemented by IEEE HelwanSB Academic Committee. 

 Inspire: 
 By public conferences and sessions, IEEE HelwanSB strives to inspire young students to reach their maximum goals by speeches of famous key speakers in various fields and in entrepreneurship particularly. 

 Enable: 
 By providing career opportunities and summer internships for senior engineering students, IEEE HelwanSB gives them the opportunity to kick-start their career and professional work. 

 Follow us on: 
 www.facebook.com/helwansb 
 www.twitter.com/helwansb
